titles.title: Consumer Cellphone Number Distribution Protection Act of 2007
To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit certain disclosures of cell phone numbers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 10/9/2007--Introduced. Consumer Cellphone Number Distribution Protection Act of 2007 - Amends the federal criminal code to impose a fine and/or prison term of up to six months for knowingly disclosing a wireless subscriber's unlisted cell phone number to another, for gain, without the express permission of such subscriber.
